thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Christine

author: Christine
title: Christine
text: I love the selection of books, great variety at a very good price, the only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is the shipping of books from the US to Germany APO AE military address can take a month or longer - I'm usually asked for reviews before I have even received my books - I do recommend this company to everyone especially in the US where I'm sure they don't have the shipping/receiving I do in Germany.
